description: We can structure unique systems depending on your application, or give step by step programs that have been field tested and proven for their success. Combining a unique blend of premium organic nutrients, soil, beneficial inoculates and mycorrhizae, with hands on personal instructions in application and methodology, our techniques speak for themselves by the results which manifest.
